hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

## Hours & Admissions

### Northwest Museum of Arts & Culture

**Located off W. Riverside Avenue in downtown Spokane’s historic Browne’s Addition**

2316 West 1st Avenue  
Spokane, Washington 99201  
(509) 456-3931  
[Directions](https://g.page/NorthwestMuseumofArtandCulture?share)

**Regular Museum and Store Hours**

Tuesday-Sunday, 10 am-5 pm  
Last Wednesday of the month, 10 am-8 pm

**MAC Café Hours**

The Café is temporarily closed while we complete remodeling.

**Parking**

The MAC provides free parking in its three-level garage adjacent to the main museum building. There are a limited number of ADA parking spaces and stair and elevator access on each level. Visitors with mobility issues can be dropped off near the main entrance from the street-level parking lot.

Free street parking on First Avenue and Hemlock Street is also generally available.

If you need parking assistance phone Visitor Services at 509-456-3931.

collections_text:
Opens today

## Brick by Brick: We Built this City

### Opens January 17, 2026

LEGO® Brick interpretations of Spokane’s most recognizable structures transform the creative and playful act of building into an exploration of how architecture influences our sense of community. 

[Exhibition Info](/exhibitions/current-exhibitions/brick-by-brick-build-our-city/)
